entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9609] It is expected that ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation with a value of -13,874,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.smfg.co.jp/role/DerivativeFinancialInstrumentsAndHedgeAccountingScheduleOfItemsDesignatedAsHedgedItemsDetail should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationMember and a reported value of 28,260,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.smfg.co.jp/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInEquity, http://www.smfg.co.jp/role/ShareholdersEquityMovementsOfOtherReservesDetail. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation fact are:
Period : 2020-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : JPY Decimals of ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 17.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1022837/000119312521202577/smfg-20210331.xml 25688

property.name: label
property.value: Reserve of exchange differences on translation
